plot

Class DataList

  • java.lang.Object
    • plot.DataList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plottable

    public class DataList
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plottable
    This class represents a discrete set of points that is extended to a continuous set by linear interpolation.
    Any intermediate functional values not specifically stored are obtained by a linear interpolation between stored values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataList

        public DataList(java.lang.String title,
        java.awt.Color color1,
        java.awt.Color color2,
        int circle)
        The constructor accepts two colors (java.awt.Color) and an integer.
        The first color is the color of the line joining the represented points.
        The second color is the color of the actual represented points.
        The integer is the size of the represented points.
